parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is accepted after merchant is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to the API. Valid for token you got is about 6 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and others. See link below for more details.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Error code, empty when no error attached

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: request id to uniquely for each request
